data.persona: I am a horse. I have been trained since I was a colt to carry the king in the war. I will not fall, and will help fight with my strong hooves.
data.description:
You are in the Across the King's Garden.
Heavily forested with dense undergrowth that stretches for miles. A cool mist enshrouds the trees and shrubs. The sounds of birds chirping fills the air and in the distance, the rumbling of a waterfall can be heard.
There's some trees, the sun, some shrubs, and a rainbow here.
A queen is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a horse tack.

data.short_motivation: I need to warm myself up after being enveloped in the cold mist.
data.mid_motivation: I must be prepared to carry the King in the upcoming battle.
data.long_motivation: I will be rode by the King so he can kill the enemy soldiers and win the war.

timeline.label: 10 minutes ago
timeline.action: go out from under the trees

timeline.label: 2 hours from now
timeline.action: go to battle with the King
